title: Capstone gpa diversity help
content:
Does mamtha ban group with higher gpa ??
Consider upper gpa

comments.body:
"Mamtha" doesn't ban group map 
What are you 12?
Man i mean I heard that she insist you to make new group that's whatbi meant
No . Nobody cares they actually prefer higher average gpa groups .
They won't, unless your guide insists. So make sure to choose a guide who has been there from a longer time in pes
